summary: This is a Bureau of Prisons inmate housing record for Jeffrey Epstein, detailing his cell/bed assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019. It shows his final recorded location was in cell 206L in Housing Unit 2, Range 04, where he was found dead on August 10, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the inmate housing record, showing his cell assignments and movements within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019.

events.title: Epstein's Initial Housing Assignment
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was assigned to cell 001L in House R, Range 01 at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Transfer to Special Housing Unit
events.description: Epstein was moved from general population (cell 124L AD) to cell 001L in House H (Special Housing Unit).

events.title: Final Cell Assignment and Death
events.description: Epstein was recorded in cell 206L AD in House 2, Range 04. He was found dead in this cell on the morning of August 10, 2019.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was housed in the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York under inmate number 76318-054.
The record shows Epstein was moved to a Special Housing Unit (House H) on July 23, 2019, and later returned to general population.
Epstein's final recorded location was cell 206L AD in House 2, Range 04, where he was found dead on August 10, 2019.
The document provides a precise timeline of Epstein's cell movements from July 6, 2019, to August 10, 2019.
This is an official Bureau of Prisons record documenting Epstein's incarceration prior to his death.
